channel.title: Markets on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Markets on Adam Israel

item.title: The closing of Crossed Genres Magazine
item.description: July 6th, 2009. That’s the date I discovered Crossed Genres. I know this because that’s the same date I submitted a story to them, and withdrew it the following day. See, I was still a very wet behind the ears writer and I was so excited about their current genre to notice that it was the previous month’s genre. Still, I had the good sense to email Bart and Kay the next day to let them know about my mistake but from that day forward I was a fan.
